reviewText: Arrived early. Just as described, even better in my opinion.  Very pleased.

it was really good, but the Flatiron Film Company messed up the 1st Episode on the set they forgot to add the Prologue for Episode 1 but luck will have it that Season 2 explains what happened in Season 1 as Season 2 goes on so that a plus, but it still a bummer that they forgot the Prologue but still a good set overall
Enjoy watching these movies with the kids.  I have always been a big fan of Digimon.
The start of a new adventure has episodes 1-21. A great show, I just really wish these Flatiron sets had a closed captions option
arrived within 2-3 days and my son loves it! He was watching it that very evening!

This is such a cute series and so much CD time for the money.  My grand-daughter just loves this show & it was such a good buy, that couldn't wait to get it for her.  It's filled with adventure and a better type of show than some of the junk on TV for kids today.
